Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation (420 nm, 120 mW/cm²), KCl electrolyte solution
Other Information.Additional Info: Ions can pass through under dark conditions but are blocked upon light-induced photothermal vaporization.

Sieving Mechanism: Photothermal effect-induced water vaporization and bubble formation in nanochannels

Experimental Validation.Method: Ionic current measurement under light on/off cycling, COMSOL Multiphysics simulations

Other Information.Additional Info: The MOF membrane exhibits fast and reversible light-controlled ion gating with high stability and repeatability.
